sentences.sContent: There should be no suggestion of endorsement of the product or the company by WHO.
sentences.sContent_eng: There should be no suggestion of endorsement of the product or the company by WHO.
sentences.sCn: 世卫组织不得对任何产品或公司提供支持建议。

sentences.sContent: ...It's a dramatic endorsement for a technology most people think about only when their smartphone goes dark...

synos.tran: 认可，支持；[金融]背书；签注（文件）

words.tran: 支持，赞同（endorse的过去式）；批注（文件，公文等）
背书；认可；签署；赞同；在背面签名
